Pre-Game Insights: India stretched their unbeaten run in the bilateral T20I series at home to 16 after beating Bangladesh by 86 runs in Delhi.
India have won 14 series and drawn two in a streak that goes back to September 2019.
Abhishek Sharma struck 284 runs, including three fifties, at a strike rate of 249.12 in Hyderabad.
In Delhi, India used seven bowlers and each took at least one wicket.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain could interrupt play in Hyderabad on Saturday.
